newsitem.title: GERMANY: German plane crashes after pilot shot.
newsitem.headline: German plane crashes after pilot shot.

text.p: The pilot of a single-engine German airplane that crashed near Hanover was shot dead immediately before the accident, police said on Monday.

Bullet wounds were found in the chest of the 47-year-old pilot and police said the gun used for the fatal shot was found in the plane's wreckage. A police spokesman said the pilot was probably killed before the plane crashed on Sunday.
Three passengers, including the pilot's girlfriend, died in the crash.

Witnesses said the plane lurched higher into the air shortly before crashing. Police were unable to provide any further details about the crash, which occurred as the Beechcraft plane was nearing a runway.
